alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:50PM EDT until July 02 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... South central Estill County in east central Kentucky... Northeastern Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 650 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Banford, or 7 miles southwest of Beattyville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Heidelberg around 655 PM EDT. White Ash around 700 PM EDT. Beattyville around 705 PM EDT. St. Helens around 710 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
